sentences.en: "The unauthorized use of the image of Carla Bruni caused her moral and economic damage," a court in the island capital Saint Denis de la Reunion said on Thursday.
sentences.cn: 在该岛首府圣丹尼斯日留尼汪的法院周四表示这代表了“未经授权使用卡拉布鲁尼的图片，在道德名誉和经济上对她造成的损失 ”。

sentences.en: "Yaaaaaaa," Carla let rip with the cry of the Valkyries.
sentences.cn: “呀——”卡拉放开喉咙，发出女武神瓦尔基里一般的嘶喊声。

sentences.en: After jogging for ten miles, Carla was perspiring heavily.
sentences.cn: 慢跑10英里之后, 卡拉汗流如注.

sentences.en: Carla seemed surprised by my sudden interest in her personal well - being.
sentences.cn: 对于我突然关注起她的个人幸福,卡拉感到意外.

sentences.en: Carla, curled up on the sofa, was smoking a cigarette and stroking her cat.
sentences.cn: 卡拉正蜷缩在沙发上，一边吸着烟，一边轻抚着她的猫咪。

sentences.en: Carla's boyfriend, Eric, is raiding her kitchen in search of a meal.
sentences.cn: 卡拉的男友埃里克, 正在她的厨房里找东西吃.

sentences.en: DO YOU KNOW THAT UNTIL RECENTLY CARLA HAD A BOYFRIEND?
sentences.cn: 你知道她最近有男朋友 吗 ?

sentences.en: He and Carla Torgerson take turns as the band's lead vocalist.
sentences.cn: 他和卡拉·托格森轮流担当乐队的主唱。

sentences.en: He sees that cancer is a world unto itself; that Carla is now part of this world; and that he is part of it, too.
sentences.cn: 他认识到癌症就是一个自我施加的世界；卡拉现在就是这个世界的一部分了；而他自己也是这个世界的一部分。

sentences.en: Jeff, these are my girlfriends, the Connie and Carla.
sentences.cn: 杰夫, 她们是我的女朋友, 康妮和卡拉.

sentences.en: Mick has always been very keen on Carla.
Rupert and Carla had a little hassle and went home.
sentences.cn: 鲁珀特和卡拉发生了点口角回家了.

sentences.en: Sarkozy married supermodel - turned - singer Carla Bruni last year, his third marriage.
sentences.cn: 萨科奇总统于去年与名模兼歌手卡拉?布吕尼结婚, 这是他的第三次婚姻.

sentences.en: SECRETARY CLINTON: Thank you so much, Carla, and thanks for your leadership in this undertaking as well as so much else.
sentences.cn: 非常感谢，卡拉，谢谢你在这项事业和其他众多事务中发挥的领导作用。

sentences.en: Thank you so much, Carla, and thanks for your leadership in this undertaking as well as so much else.
sentences.cn: 非常感谢，卡拉，谢谢你在这项事业和其他众多事务中发挥的领导作用。

sentences.en: They are all clever girls, but Carla bears the palm for beauty.
sentences.cn: 她们都是聪明的女孩子, 但卡拉是其中最美丽的.

sentences.en: They are making fun of Carla's new hair style; it's strange.
sentences.cn: 他们正取笑卡拉的新发型, 那发型怪怪的.

sentences.en: Why did you tell Carla that we were invited to his party?
sentences.cn: 你为什么要跟卡拉说我们被邀请了?
